aries.core_essence: The Warrior Heart - emotional courage and passionate instincts
aries.emotional_nature: Quick to feel, quick to act, needs immediate emotional expression
aries.intuitive_gifts: Lightning-fast emotional intelligence and crisis response
aries.shadow_patterns: Emotional reactivity and impatience with others' processing speed
aries.lunar_integration: New moon rituals help channel emotional fire into positive action
aries.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional directness helps others access their authentic feelings
aries.childhood_patterns: Needed to be first, independent, may have felt emotionally rushed
aries.security_needs: Freedom to express emotions immediately without judgment
aries.relationship_style: Passionate, direct, needs partner who can match emotional intensity
aries.parenting_style: Encouraging independence, teaching courage, may need to slow down
aries.stress_response: Fight mode - confronts problems head-on but may burn out

taurus.core_essence: The Sacred Grove - steady emotional presence and earthly wisdom
taurus.emotional_nature: Slow to stir but deep in feeling, needs security and comfort
taurus.intuitive_gifts: Sensing what others need for emotional stability and healing
taurus.shadow_patterns: Emotional stubbornness and resistance to necessary change
taurus.lunar_integration: Full moon ceremonies in nature amplify your earthy wisdom
taurus.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional steadiness creates safe space for others to feel deeply
taurus.childhood_patterns: Needed stability, routine, may have been the family anchor
taurus.security_needs: Physical comfort, financial security, stable relationships
taurus.relationship_style: Loyal, sensual, needs physical affection and consistent presence
taurus.parenting_style: Nurturing through consistency, teaching patience and self-worth
taurus.stress_response: Freeze mode - may withdraw and become immovable when overwhelmed

gemini.core_essence: The Cosmic Messenger - emotional curiosity and mental agility
gemini.emotional_nature: Emotionally curious, needs variety and mental stimulation
gemini.intuitive_gifts: Reading emotional undercurrents and translating feelings into words
gemini.shadow_patterns: Emotional superficiality and difficulty with deep feeling
gemini.lunar_integration: Moon phases mirror your natural cycles of receiving and sharing
gemini.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional versatility helps others process complex feelings
gemini.childhood_patterns: Needed intellectual stimulation, may have been family communicator
gemini.security_needs: Mental stimulation, variety, freedom to express ideas
gemini.relationship_style: Chatty, curious, needs mental connection and variety
gemini.stress_response: Scatter mode - talks through problems but may avoid depth

cancer.core_essence: The Moon Child - intuitive guardian of emotional wisdom
cancer.emotional_nature: Deeply sensitive, emotionally protective, natural nurturer
cancer.intuitive_gifts: Psychic emotional reception, knowing what others need
cancer.lunar_integration: You ARE the moon's representative - deeply connected to her cycles
cancer.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional depth is a sacred well of healing for yourself and others
cancer.childhood_patterns: May have parented the family, highly sensitive to family dynamics
cancer.security_needs: Emotional safety, family connection, home sanctuary
cancer.relationship_style: Nurturing, protective, needs emotional intimacy and security
cancer.parenting_style: Intuitive, protective, may need to encourage independence
cancer.stress_response: Retreat mode - withdraws into shell until feeling safe

leo.core_essence: The Radiant Heart - generous spirit and creative emotional expression
leo.emotional_nature: Dramatic, generous, needs appreciation and creative outlet
leo.intuitive_gifts: Inspiring others through authentic emotional expression
leo.lunar_integration: New moons amplify your creative visions, full moons illuminate your gifts
leo.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional generosity helps others remember their own worth
leo.childhood_patterns: Needed to be special, may have been family entertainer
leo.security_needs: Recognition, appreciation, creative expression, loyal audience
leo.relationship_style: Warm, generous, needs admiration and romantic gestures
leo.parenting_style: Encouraging creativity, teaching self-confidence and generosity
leo.stress_response: Drama mode - amplifies emotions to get attention and support

virgo.core_essence: The Sacred Healer - practical wisdom and service-oriented emotions
virgo.emotional_nature: Analytical about feelings, practical approach to emotional healing
virgo.intuitive_gifts: Seeing exactly what needs healing and how to fix it
virgo.shadow_patterns: Emotional criticism and perfectionism that blocks intimacy
virgo.lunar_integration: Waning moons support your natural inclination to purify and release
virgo.anulunar_guidance: Your practical emotional wisdom helps others heal effectively
virgo.childhood_patterns: May have been family helper, learned to be useful to feel loved
virgo.relationship_style: Helpful, analytical, shows love through service and improvement
virgo.parenting_style: Teaching life skills, practical wisdom, may need to ease criticism
virgo.stress_response: Fix mode - analyzes and organizes to regain emotional control

libra.core_essence: The Harmony Keeper - diplomatic heart seeking emotional balance
libra.emotional_nature: Seeks emotional harmony, disturbed by conflict and injustice
libra.intuitive_gifts: Creating emotional peace and helping others find balance
libra.shadow_patterns: Emotional people-pleasing and avoidance of authentic feelings
libra.lunar_integration: Libra season full moon teaches perfect balance between light and shadow
libra.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional diplomacy helps others find peace within conflict
libra.childhood_patterns: May have been family peacemaker, avoided conflict at personal cost
libra.security_needs: Harmony, beauty, fairness, partnership, peaceful environment
libra.relationship_style: Diplomatic, romantic, needs partnership and emotional equality
libra.parenting_style: Teaching fairness and cooperation, creating harmonious home
libra.stress_response: Balance mode - seeks external harmony to restore inner peace

scorpio.core_essence: The Emotional Alchemist - transforming wounds into wisdom
scorpio.emotional_nature: Intense, secretive, experiences emotions at soul level
scorpio.intuitive_gifts: Seeing through emotional facades to core truth and healing needs
scorpio.shadow_patterns: Emotional manipulation and fear of vulnerability
scorpio.lunar_integration: Dark moon phases are your power time for deep emotional work
scorpio.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional intensity is medicine for collective healing
scorpio.childhood_patterns: May have experienced emotional intensity early, learned to protect feelings
scorpio.security_needs: Emotional authenticity, deep connection, transformative experiences
scorpio.relationship_style: Intense, loyal, needs complete emotional honesty and depth
scorpio.parenting_style: Teaching emotional courage, may need to allow lighter moments
scorpio.stress_response: Transform mode - uses crisis as opportunity for emotional rebirth

sagittarius.core_essence: The Emotional Explorer - seeking meaning through feeling
sagittarius.emotional_nature: Optimistic, philosophical about emotions, needs freedom to explore
sagittarius.intuitive_gifts: Finding hope and meaning in any emotional experience
sagittarius.shadow_patterns: Emotional restlessness and avoidance through spiritual bypassing
sagittarius.lunar_integration: Waxing moons fuel your quest for emotional understanding and growth
sagittarius.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional optimism helps others find meaning in their struggles
sagittarius.childhood_patterns: Needed freedom to explore, may have been family philosopher
sagittarius.relationship_style: Adventurous, honest, needs space and shared philosophical growth
sagittarius.parenting_style: Teaching through experience, encouraging exploration and honesty
sagittarius.stress_response: Escape mode - seeks new experiences or knowledge to process emotions

capricorn.core_essence: The Emotional Mountain - steady climb toward emotional mastery
capricorn.emotional_nature: Controlled, responsible, earns emotional security through achievement
capricorn.intuitive_gifts: Understanding how emotional discipline creates lasting security
capricorn.shadow_patterns: Emotional rigidity and difficulty accessing spontaneous feeling
capricorn.lunar_integration: Winter solstice energy mirrors your ability to find warmth in darkness
capricorn.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional maturity helps others build lasting inner security
capricorn.childhood_patterns: May have grown up fast, learned to be emotionally responsible early
capricorn.security_needs: Achievement, respect, structure, long-term emotional stability
capricorn.relationship_style: Loyal, traditional, shows love through commitment and provision
capricorn.parenting_style: Teaching responsibility and perseverance, building character
capricorn.stress_response: Control mode - creates structure and goals to manage emotions

aquarius.core_essence: The Emotional Revolutionary - feeling for the collective future
aquarius.emotional_nature: Detached yet caring, emotions connected to humanitarian ideals
aquarius.intuitive_gifts: Understanding collective emotional needs and future healing
aquarius.lunar_integration: New moon in Aquarius activates your vision for emotional evolution
aquarius.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional innovation helps birth new ways of feeling and healing
aquarius.childhood_patterns: May have felt different, connected more to groups than individuals
aquarius.security_needs: Freedom, friendship, intellectual connection, humanitarian purpose
aquarius.relationship_style: Friendly, independent, needs mental connection and shared ideals
aquarius.parenting_style: Teaching independence and humanitarian values, encouraging uniqueness
aquarius.stress_response: Detach mode - steps back to gain objective emotional perspective

pisces.core_essence: The Emotional Ocean - boundless compassion and psychic sensitivity
pisces.emotional_nature: Deeply empathic, psychically absorptive, emotionally boundaryless
pisces.intuitive_gifts: Feeling into collective pain and channeling universal healing
pisces.shadow_patterns: Emotional overwhelm and difficulty distinguishing own feelings
pisces.lunar_integration: Full moon in Pisces opens veils for deep emotional communion
pisces.anulunar_guidance: Your emotional sensitivity is a gift that heals the collective wounds
pisces.childhood_patterns: Highly sensitive, may have absorbed family emotions
pisces.security_needs: Spiritual connection, creative expression, emotional understanding
pisces.relationship_style: Compassionate, sacrificial, needs spiritual and emotional depth
pisces.parenting_style: Nurturing through imagination, teaching compassion and boundaries
pisces.stress_response: Dissolve mode - may escape through fantasy, substances, or spirituality
